name: appsmith
tagline: A low-code platform for building internal tools with APIs and databases
description: Appsmith is a low-code platform for building internal tools quickly using drag-and-drop widgets, custom queries, and REST/GraphQL integrations. It can be self-hosted and includes role-based access, versioning, and triggers.

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Build internal tools quickly with drag-and-drop widgets. Ship faster

features.title: REST API
features.description: Connect to REST APIs, GraphQL, and databases seamlessly. Universal connectivity

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Git integration for tracking changes and collaboration. Professional workflow

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Deploy on your infrastructure for complete data control. Privacy guaranteed
